pages.text: $(italic)With the red math dust from the underground, you've built gigantic constructions several times, just to emulate a parrot's ability to calculate. When you look at these, your breath literally stops (and the rest of the world, too, multiple times a second). The energy laden $(l:general/shards#citrine)Citrine$(/l) seems like a perfect match for basic arithmetic logic.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Available modes: Addition, Subtraction, Multiplication, Division, Modulo, Min and Max. First input is the back, second the highest signal on the sides.
$(italic)有了来自地下的红色数学粉末，你已经建造了几座巨大的建筑，只是为了模仿鹦鹉的计算能力。当你看到这些，你的呼吸就会停止（世界上其他地方也是如此，每秒数次）。充满能量的$(l:general/shards#citrine)黄水晶$(/l)似乎与基本算术逻辑完美匹配。
可用模式：加法、减法、乘法、除法、模、最小和最大。第一个输入是背面，第二个是侧面的最高信号。
